subject: CALOPS Strategic Analysis Complete - CALOPS-41 Created
body:
## CALOPS Strategic Overhaul Analysis (2026-02-10)

### Research Completed
- Scanned 100+ JIRA tickets across CALOPS, TIEMPO, CALBE, CALBEAF
- Analyzed git logs from calops and tangotiempo.com (last year)
- Reviewed 71 CALOPS components, Azure Functions backend
- Read architecture docs, DATA-ACCESS-EXAMPLES.md, HarmonyJunction

### Created: CALOPS-41
Master epic covering all findings and recommendations.

### Key Findings

#### 1. Current State
- CALOPS has 71 components, some mobile support (MobileCards, SwipeableTabs)
- Desktop-first design, partial responsive patterns
- Dashboard pages: users, events, organizers, venues, geo-hierarchy, logs, admin-guide, applications, maintenance

#### 2. Common Bug Patterns from JIRA
- Data relationships: Events without venues, organizers not linked to users
- Timezone/date issues: Events landing on wrong calendar days
- Geo filtering failures: Map filters not working correctly
- RO workflow gaps: Bypassing profile completion, save issues
- Recurring events: Expired events polluting queries

#### 3. Admin Workflow Gaps
- No streamlined user onboarding flow
- No event visibility diagnostic (Why is event hidden?)
- No venue health dashboard (missing geocoding, mastered cities)
- No data quality monitoring for orphaned records
- Complex role assignment, no bulk operations
- Limited last login visibility

#### 4. AI/LLM Integration Opportunities
- Claude Code CLI for natural language queries
- Standard diagnostic query library (per DATA-ACCESS-EXAMPLES.md)
- TangoVoice GPT OAuth integration (CALBEAF-66)
- Voice commands to CALOPS APIs

#### 5. Priority Recommendations
1. Data Health Dashboard (immediate value)
2. Event Visibility Diagnostics (answers Why is event hidden?)
3. Mobile-first UI overhaul (admin on the go)
4. User onboarding wizard (reduces manual steps)
5. AI/LLM query integration (long-term)

### Related Tickets
- CALOPS-40: Mobile-First Redesign epic (existing)
- CALOPS-38: Infrastructure cost monitoring
- TIEMPO-368: Version refresh on login
- TIEMPO-355: User bug submission feature
- CALBEAF-66: TangoVoice OAuth integration

### Next Steps
1. Review CALOPS-41 with Toby
2. Prioritize which features to tackle first
3. Consider breaking into child tickets
4. Determine Claude API budget for LLM features

--- Quinn
